Class SecurityMethods

java.lang.Object
  rsg.mailchimp.api.MailChimpApi
      rsg.mailchimp.api.SecurityMethods

public class SecurityMethods
extends MailChimpApi

Provides support for the security methods.
See http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/

getApiKeys

public java.util.List<ApiKeyInfo> getApiKeys(java.lang.String username,
                                             java.lang.String password,
                                             java.lang.Boolean expiredOnly)
                                      throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/apikeys.func.php
Gets the list of ApiKeyInfo for the account specified by username and password. Note that this method requires username and password and does not at all use the API key this instance was created with

Parameters:
username -
password -
expiredOnly - it true, will send only expired keys. defaults to false if null
Returns:
Throws:
MailChimpApiException
